Die 5 Herausforderungen, Buddhas steinerne Schale
Le 5 prove - Ciotola di pietra del Buddha

The Five Impossible Tasks - A Stone Begging bowl of the Buddha
五道難題：佛祖的碗

A Stone Begging bowl of the Buddha from India
kDesc
A sparkling Buddha's bowl which is from India according to legends.[#Legal]
Bol lustré et élégant ayant appartenu au Bouddha, provient d’Inde.[#Legal]
Schimmernd und beeindruckend ist Buddhas Schale aus Indien.[#Legal]
La ciotola del Buddha, brillante e graziosa, proveniente dall'India. [#Legal]
El recipiente brillante y lleno de gracia de Buda, proveniente de la India.[#Legal]
天竺にあるとされ、光り輝くありがたい仏様の鉢。[#Legal]
천축에 있다고 하는, 빛나는 부처님의 돌 발우.[#Legal]
A sparkling Buddha's bowl which is from India according to legends.[#Legal]
佛祖的碗，據說來自古印度，發出閃爍光芒。[#Legal]
佛祖的碗，據說來自古印度，發出閃爍光芒。[#Legal]
A sparkling Buddha's bowl which is from India according to legends.[#Legal]
